name: DisOrder (itch) (MMoutafis95, BargainBin2)
description:
DisOrder tries to emulate the hardships that someone suffering with Depersonalisation/Derealisation disorder may feel when engaging in everyday activities such as hanging out with other socially. It does this through the symbolism of feeling small, as if the world around you is not your own, perhaps even unreal. Fighting off negative thoughts while collecting positive thoughts that were once prevelant in your mind can help to free you of these terrible perceptions.

Use candles to guide your way to your lost positive thoughts, and also to re - ignite your lamp when it gets too dim.

If you are suffering or know someone who is, please seek professional medical help such as a therapist or psychologist.

Alternativley you can seek out forums such as https://www.dpselfhelp.com/forums/ to answer questions you may have from others willing to help, or who might also be in the same position as you.
